snippet: Pamela B. Gann, president of Claremont McKenna College, discussed the circumstances surrounding the submission of inaccurate SAT data and how her school can regain trust.
abstract: Pamela B. Gann, president of Claremont McKenna College, discussed the circumstances surrounding the submission of inaccurate SAT data and how her school can regain trust.

headline.main: Claremont's President Says Lack of Proper Controls Led to SAT Misinformation
headline.print_headline: California: Lack of Controls Cited In College Cheating
